resources.string: You need to sign up with e-mail address which you have shared with your personal trainer.
You cannot be signed up. Typed e-mail address is not authorised by your personal trainer.
You are about to receive an activation e-mail. Check your e-mail box and click the activation link included in the e-mail message. Then come back here and tap \"Continue\"
Unexpected error occurred. Most likely the server is not responding. Please try again in a while.
There is a problem connecting the server. You need to try again latter.
It seems that you are not connected to the Internet. Check your connection and try again.
You are about to receive an activation e-mail to register this new device. Check your e-mail box and click the activation link included in the e-mail message. Then come back here and tap \"Continue\"
You are already registered on another device. If you want to use this device please use activation e-mail which you are about to receive and come back to the app.
If you repeat registration process the activation link which we sent will become invalid. If you haven\'t received the activation email check spam folder first.
You have tried to register too many times from this device. Try again in an hour.
I\'m still waiting for you! Clik activation link included in the email which was sent to you, and than click \"Continue\".
This time it\'s taking too long…

string.name: confirm_schedule_encourage
string.b: So what? Will you be there?

resources.string: The training is planned on %1$s. Where? Here: %2$s (%3$s)
The training is planned on %1$s. Still no idea where…
This app is created for those who take part in personal trainings delivered by trainer Kasia Stasiecka. It was developed as since project.
It is only one day left!
Traininig ia about to be canceled, Persolan trainer will be informed. Continue?
Do you want to quit app now?

You are registered on another device. Once you confirm this registration by clicking on activation link you will be logged out fro other devices.
When signed out you will be not able to use this app on this phone until new registration. Logging out?
You were singed out. If you want to use the app please register your account.
Let us stay fit! We will practice together. Be prepared.
We will practice! I\'m inviting you to training with me.
